We are Improbable and we created a new kind of distributed operating system which can power massive scale simulations, we call it SpatialOS - https://improbable.io/. It enables developers to build massive, detailed simulations across thousands of machines in the cloud. It transforms how we look at complex systems in areas as diverse as city management, defence, economics and entertainment, enabling a new class of applications and businesses for the future.
